Business Plan/Branding

In 2012 I decided to start a small home cleaning business to help me pay for my education. The business was called SuperScrubbers Home Cleaning and I ran it until 2016. During it's time of business Superscrubbers employed three home cleaners, ran a client list of 25 homes, and maintianed longstanding professional relationships with all of them. I was able to manage the business while being a full time student,teaching Muay Thai kickboxing, and freelancing graphic design jobs on the side. The link bellow will take you to the SuperScrubbers website.
